ygData.subject: Re: A new bot
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, Inferno s taken them, but he s not posting with them, and it doesn t look like he ever will, so the name s fine. ... Approaching Baal, Havoc detects Sun

Yeah, Inferno's taken them, but he's not posting with them, and it
doesn't look like he ever will, so the name's fine.

::Havoc::

Approaching Baal, Havoc detects Sun Crusher on his scanners. He
growls, flying down toward the two bots. Havoc lands on the other side
of Baal from Sun Crusher, deciding not to fire. This might as well be
a civil meeting.

"I am Havoc," he says to Baal, "From the Alliance. We picked up your
signature and thought that you might want to join a strong faction."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Icedemon, I'm not sure, but I believe Inferno731 has created the
characters 
> Diablo, Baal, and Mephisto and has the profiles on the website and
will play 
> them when he has some free time.  So, you may want to verify it. 
Just wanted 
> to let you know in case you had to change the name)
> 
> Sun Crusher:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Sun Crusher landed only twenty feet near Baal.  He raised his arms
in the 
> air.  "Hold, robot.  I am Sun Crusher, follower of the Chaos-Bringer
and 
> member of the mighty Brotherhood.  May I ask who you are?"
> 
> Sun Crusher armed his weapons to full capacity.  His scanners
detected a few 
> robots heading this way.
> 
> "We must act quickly.  Enemies seeking to destroy us both head this
way.  Our 
> only chance is to join together and meet these enemies head on and
crush 
> them.  What do you say?  After the battle the Chaos-Bringer will
give you 
> great power as a reward, I assure you.  He often rewards victory. 
Failure on 
> the other hand...but anyway, I trail off."
> 
> "Will you join me and the Brotherhood?"
